election_record.label: Pennsylvania 1809 House of Representatives, Montgomery County, Special

overview.note: "The Democratic Delegates of Montgomery County, have unanimously nominated Richard T. Leech, to fill the vacancy in the House of Representatives, occassioned by the appointment of N.B. Boileau, Secretary." The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). January 10, 1809.

"Richard T. Leech, a Democrat, is elected in room of N.B. Boileau, without opposition, excepting a few scattering votes; and has taken his seat in the House of Representatives." The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). January 24, 1809.

election_record.reference: The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). January 10, 1809.
The Intelligencer, and Weekly Advertiser (Lancaster, PA). January 24, 1809.
